item.description:
Hi Everyone, As promised at our last meeting I am posting this event. It would be nice to go as a group. Please let me know your interest in attending this event by Friday the 9th of July (This Friday). Based on interest I will purchase tickets so we can hopefully sit together. Perhaps dinner prior might be a good idea.

Thanks.

Event: U.S. Women vs. Sweden Women

Date: Saturday, July 17, 2010
Location: Rentschler Field; East Hartford, Conn.
Match: U.S. Women's National Team vs. Sweden â€“ International Friendly
Kickoff: 7:30 p.m. ET
Prices: Vary from $18-$48.
item.name: U.S. Women vs. Sweden Women
